column5: Those are huge  I've never purposely tried fishing for them.  I normally get them by accident when I'm carp fishing.  I'd definitely love to hook into fish of that size.  Well done

That's one of the strangest requests I've heard in a while. Excuse my ignorance for not knowing how things work down there, but if these fellas tried to pay and you weren't open, then why would you expect them to go back after if the entrance allowed them in?  It would seem more reasonable to keep the entrance closed until business hours start, if it is pay per useage.  Nice fish Pure.
i paid for parking in the box in the 24/7 bait store and we rang the bell at like 7
Hey guys just wondering how you prepare your sucker meat? do you put anything on them?? Wanted to try a spot by my place but not to sure on how to fish them. any info will help. thanks  -fishnpro
we where just using plain sucker meat just scale the sucker and cut chunks as you need
Not bad at all guys!
we will be back down this weekend for any one whos going
Pretty cat that should excite the redneck from down south when he has a looksy

Wow great catches! I'd like to try my luck on the Thames. Aside from sucker meat, what else do you guys have luck with? I saw a post about shrimp & garlic a while back,wondering if that would be as effective
you can get them on shrip, worms ,minnows anything and every thing but cutbait works best for those big guys

Headed down to dunville at 5 in the morning to get there and have the whole river to are selves until more and more people started showing up but was a very good day ill let the pics do the rest.    in all we got around 5 to 6 each these where some of the bigger guys not bad for first timers
Damn......... Why haven't I been down to the Grand yet this time of year! What outfit and line test did you use to reel those in?
Nice cats!!... thanks for the report!.... I still have a hard time bringing myself to touch the buggers! LOL

we got all them off shore i was running 14lb test with 2 egg sinkers, the top one came out to be 17lbs had a good gut  we are heading back down next weekend also  we kept 2 little guys to try and see how they taste
right on brother!  Dunnville isn't all that far away from me, but I can never bring myself to drive out there for a good skunkin'!  Thanks for the report dude, UF
as long as you bring sucker meat some egg sinkers and big hooks i doubt you will be skunked every one down there got one
Thanks for the report.  I'd love to make the trek down there this year.
Nice report Brother!!! I wouldn't touch one of those with a barge pole, but more power to you! Jim
If you don't mind me asking, what's in the blue barrel?. Nice cats too btw
we were keeping like 2 small cats so we threw them in there
SWEET!  Where do you go out from?  I gotta head down there for some of that action!

Dang I was fishing in that exact spot with the same set up and bait on friday and got skunked. No fish were caught between the 15 people there all day so I guess i picked the wrong day to try.  Anyhow nice fish, that second one looks like a beast.
Nice cats. WTG!
Nice cats, couple tanks for sure.  Thanks for the report.
gotta get out there soon .. nice kitties
Nice catch, did you fish the cats in Steve's Marina? Thanks!
Those must have been loads of fun to catch.  WTG

Was going to say, I stopped by on Friday and there was some serious skunking going on, even the boats were coming up dry.  Pure, was the bite more in the morning or steady all day?  I made up some cat bait and going to give it a shot some time this week.
yah we where out front of steves and the but outa the whole day really picked up around 4:30-5:00 pm we even got a double  header although we were catching them all day
Real nice cats Pure Not bad at all for you guys first time!!! Congratulations  Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman
hey Pure great cats!  I have caught the smaller Cats but how are the big 1's are they lunkers like suckers or do they fight like mad! just curious!
I've always found that the BIG Cats want to stay on the bottom and they will let you know that!!  Once you get them off of it they will dig hard to get back there.
Some good weight to those Cats, good work...

Glad you young Lads had a good day....guess that was you in the Green Van ringing the door bell that early morning  ...please next time stop in the store when it Opens to pay for Parking ...you fished with one of the best shore cat boys on the Grand Ricky Jr im sure he set you up on how to catch these cats as you were moving around in the morning ...
